name: 60-Second Thief
description:
Try to steal as much gold as you can in 60 seconds, but don't be too greedy, because if the timer hits 0 and you haven't left the building, you will be caught and you'll lose all your precious gold.

Short guide:
1. When your backpack is full, go to the bottom left side of the level, where you will have with the option to deposit your gold or leave completely.
2. Crates can be pushed.
3. When you are near gold, keep pressing Space to fill your backpack with it.
4. You can view the controls in the options menu.
